DOC.brief_summary: The purpose investigation compare post-operative fracture wound heal use Inion OTPS Biodegradable Fixation System implant versus Conventional metal implant .
DOC.brief_title: Inion OTPS Biodegradable Fixation System Ankle
DOC.criteria: Distal fibular fracture include either instabile/dislocated Weber class B Weber class C fracture OR bimalloelar fracture lateral malloelus fracture medial malleolus fracture OR trimalleolar fracture lateral medial malleolus fracture posterior malleolus fracture le 1/4 articulas surface fracture Fresh/acute fracture Aged 18 60 year Contraindication Inion OTPS Biodegradable Fixation System : Active potential infection , patient 's condition , limit blood supply , insufficient quantity quality bone , patient cooperation quaranteed Multiple trauma Previous ankle fracture Pregnancy Bone malignancy Any clinically significant condition base investigator judgement highload bearing application
